attributes.action: Allow 16-18yr olds to add their vote to the recent referendum result
attributes.additional_details: The government promotes the idea of young people being able to "Enjoy & achieve" and under the current climate perhaps most significantly to "positively contribute to society" & yet denies young adults the opportunity by disabling them, to contribute in a decision about the EU that directly impacts their future - for better or worse.
attributes.background: A petition for an additional referendum so that the young adults .... Who, let's not misunderstand ..... Already have the right to decide on so many issues that directly impact on them .... Have been totally excluded from what may turn out to be, one of the most important decisions of their future.
